flawed_nl_solution:
Daria wants to buy tickets for four persons, so the cost will be 4 tickets * $90/ticket = $<<4*90=306>>306.
Daria currently has $189, so she needs $306 - $189 = $<<306-189=117>>117 more.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 360, not 306. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
